All Classes

Class Description
Door
Represents a door within the simulation
Entryway
Abstraction representing an entryway to the home within the simulation (windows, doors)
EntrywaySensor
Represents an entryway sensor within the simulation
House
Represents the house within the simulation, uses Singleton pattern (creational pattern)
Light
Represents a light (or group of lights operated by a common switch) within the simulation
Logger
This is a singleton class used to hold the outputConsole so it can be written to by all that need it
MotionSensor
Represents a motion detector with the simulation
Observer
The abstract Observer class
Permission
Class type permission, used to regulate what individuals have permission for what
PERMISSION_TYPE
Permission type enum type
Profile
Class type profile used to create user profiles
Room
class type Room used to create Room objects which have doors, windows, a room motionsensor, a name and an ID
RoomControlsController
This is the controller class for the RoomControls.fxml file
SecurityModule
Security module used to monitor presence of individuals in different rooms as well as invoke away mode
Sensor
Abstraction representing a sensor in the home within the simulation (motion, entryway)
SimulationParameterController
This is the controller class for the ParametorEditor.fxml file
SimulationParameters
A simulationParameters class using the singleton pattern to create one instance that can be accessed anywhere
SmartHomeSimulator
This is the launch class of the simulator.
SmartHomeSimulatorController
This is the controller class for the RoomControls.fxml file AND the Dashboard.fxml file
Time
The time class used to keep time and update the time
USER_TYPE
User type enum holding each user type
Window
Represents a window within the simulation
